titles.title: Rio Puerco Watershed Management Program Reauthorization Act of 2018
To permanently reauthorize the Rio Puerco Management Committee and the Rio Puerco Watershed Management Program.
Rio Puerco Watershed Management Program Reauthorization Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.

bill.summary:
Rio Puerco Watershed Management Program Reauthorization Act of 2018
This bill amends the Omnibus Parks and Public Lands Management Act of 1996 to permanently reauthorize the Rio Puerco Management Committee and the Rio Puerco Watershed Management Program.
